events.description: Join us every Monday for an intentional listening experience. Share your favorite tunes and discover new music while enjoying house-made beer and snacks. events.title: Tim & Jenny Ostdiek
events.description: Colorado folk duo Jenny and Tim Ostdiek bring a rare mix of heart and humor to the stage. Their soulful harmonies and thoughtful songwriting move effortlessly between joy and introspection, drawing listeners into a space of warmth and connection.

events.title: The Saints
events.description: The Saints is a seven-piece band that has a real New Orleans feel.  We play funk, R&B, soul, and rock, both original tunes and cover songs. We cover music by popular artists like Prince, Jon Cleary, the Neville Brothers, Tina Turner, and Aretha Franklin, as well as newer artists.

events.title: Rockin Horse

events.title: Holiday Cookie & Sweets Exchange
events.description: Get ready to swap your favorite holiday treats with fellow sweet lovers! Join us in person at Bricks on Main for a fun and tasty exchange. Bring your best cookies or sweets to share and discover delicious goodies from others. It's the perfect way to celebrate the season, meet new friends, and enjoy!
